nodes.text: Sausages were a meat food product which could be shaped as patties or cylindrical links. Various types included bantha sausage, Klatooine paddy frog sausage, and nuna sausage, the latter two of which were served in Dex's Diner on Coruscant during the days leading to the rise of the Galactic Empire. Meatlump meals, favored by the eponymous Meatlump Gang of Corellia, were also processed into sausage links.

Prepared as patties or cylindrical links, sausages were an edible food product made from the meat of several different creatures throughout the galaxy, including banthas, Klatooine paddy frogs, and nunas.

In Dex's Diner on Coruscant, Klatooine paddy frog sausages were served in "Hungry Hutt" breakfast sandwiches. The sandwiches were sold for 6.5 credits. The diner also served four links of nuna sausage as a breakfast side for 3.7 credits, and a "Number 4" Pantoran Plate Special, which consisted of steamed phraig with two nuna sausage patties for 4.7 credits.
Sausages as mentioned in-universe are the same as real world sausages.
